# recurrences

**Instance Property**

Specifies the days on which the trigger can execute.

## Declaration

```swift
var recurrences: [DateComponents]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property represents the days of the week that the trigger recurs; the trigger ignores all properties other than [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents/weekday] on the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/DateComponents] object.

## Controlling recurrence

- **updateRecurrences(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the days of the week the trigger can repeat.
- **executeOnce**: A Boolean that can execute the trigger many times.
- **updateExecuteOnce(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the repetition status of the event trigger.
